= tsv2csv =

== Format ==
cg tsv2csv ?infile? ?outfile?

== Summary ==
Converts tab-sparated ([[tsv]]) data to comma-separated value (csv)

== Arguments ==
; **infile**: file to be converted, if not given, uses stdin. File may be compressed.
; **outfile**: write results to outfile, if not given, uses stdout

== Category ==
Format Conversion
